sqoop.arg: SELECT AcquisitionAttributeTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID,AttributeTypeID,EntryOrder,Formula,IsExplicitStep, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionAttributeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,AcquisitionID,MeasurementSetTagProfileID,PartInstanceTagProfileID,DefectTagProfileID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RfDataCollectionFreqID,DataCollectionPeriod,IsRetired,AcqPlan,VMTPID,CauseActionTPID,Variant,PartTypeID,RevisionNo,IsEdited,HeadAlias,CauseTagListID,ActionTagListID,IsMeasuredWhenProduced,IsInvPackCheck,IsEBATrigger, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionSubTypeID,ActionSubType,ActionTypeID,Description,SubActionTypeCode,ReportOrder,Format,IsRetired, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionSubType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetID,ParentAssetID,SubAssetID,Lvl,SortOrder,Comments,AssetLevelID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetExplosion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,RfVarGridStyleID,IsPITCols,IsPISNoCol,RfAttrGridStyleID,IsStepGrid,IsAttrSkipStep,ShowAttrInfoTip,UseAttrImagePicker,AttrGridContextMenu,IsPISerial,AutoGenerateSerialNo,PITSampling,MSTSampling,VAInterlace,IsExplicitHS,SampleSizeMode,OnDataCommitGoTo,IsDisableOOSWarnings,StepEditPolicy,DisableKeyboardOverride,ChainToStopped,DisplayPlan,AttrPassFailDefault,VariableSaveMode,AttrCellClick, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AVDataEntryOptions WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CommentsID,LoginID,DT,Subject,Comments, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Comments WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariableTypeID,JobCommentLength,RfTorqueDirectionID,RfCycleEndTimeID,ThresholdTorque,RfMeasurementTypeID,RfFrequencyResponseID,UnitID,AuditAngle,CrnAdapterID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CRN_AcquisitionVariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DocumentID,FileName,Description,MimeType,Attachment,UploadDT,LoginID,DocumentTypeID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Document WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT GaugeID,Gauge,GaugeTypeID,DataDeviceID,SerialNo,SupplierID,DatePurchased, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Gauge WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineCellID,LineID,IsPartNumber,IsWONumber,IsCustomer,IsDescription,IsHeader,IsRows,ConfigLayout,IsClickable,IsStopJob,IsStartJob,IsEditable,IsStartNextJob,IsWORef1,IsWORef2,IsWORef3,IsWorkInstruction, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineCell WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionChainID,AcquisitionContextID,Sequence,LkACAChainID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkACAChain WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LKConcernInventoryPackID,ConcernID,InventoryPackID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKConcernInventoryPack WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentMaintProcID,DocumentID,MaintenanceProcedureID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentMaintProc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkLocationMachineStageId,MachineStageId,LocationId,IsLocationIn,IsLocationOut, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLocationMachineStage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationTypeID,MachineStageTypeID,LkOpTMSTID,PassName, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkOpTMST WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartID,UnitID,LkPartUnitID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKPartUnit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolStateID,ToolCavityID,RfToolCavityStatusID,ToolCavityStateReasonID,IsCavityChangeState,LkTSTCID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkTSTC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkWIRMSetReqID,WorkInstructionResultID,MeasurementSetRequiredID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkWIRMSetReq WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageTypeID,Name,Description,MachineStageTypeCode, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenancePartPlannedID,MaintenanceProcedureStepID,PartID,PlannedCost,IsOptional,Quantity,UnitID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenancePartPlanned WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureStepID,MaintenanceProcedureStep,MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,StepOrder,SubPartID,Component,RfMaintenanceCheckTypeID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,Test,USL,LSL,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,Nom,Units,DecPlaces, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MeasurementSetPID,ActualAttrSampleSize,AcquisitionContextID,IsEdited,DT,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RevisionNo,PartID,JobID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSetP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCCounterID,OPCItemID,Description,LoValue,HiValue,Scale,Offset,Formula,UnitCountTypeID,ScrapReasonID,ModifiedDT,LoginID,IsProduction,AcceptableRateOfChange,RfDeltaValueModeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCCounter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCMachineEventCodeID,OPCMachineEventCode,OPCMachineEventID,MachineStopReasonID,IsRunning, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCMachineEventCode WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationTypeID,OperationType,OperationTypeCode,Description,PartTypeID,Sequence,IsOptional, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OperationType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ProductionStopID,StopComments,StopLoginID,OpenedStopDT,SavedStopDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedProductionStopID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStop_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ScrapID,CollectionQuantity,CollectionUnitID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedScrapID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Scrap_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,ShiftTypeID,ShiftPatternID,FromDT,ToDT,Sequence, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Shift WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCChartComponentID,SPCChartDefID,SPCVarChartID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartComponent WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCDefaultControlLimitID,SPCChartDefID,RfChartComponentID,RfChart,UCL,CL,LCL,ModifiedDT,LoginID,ProductID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCDefaultControlLimit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagCauseActionID,CauseActionID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagCauseAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTreeID,TagTree, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTree WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,MachineStageID,JobID,Downtime, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Job_Shift_Downtime WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolCavityID,CavityNumber,CavityName,ToolID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolCavity WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolUsageID,JobID,MachineStageID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,ToolPosition,ToolChangeReasonID,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OperationID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolUsage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VarChartOCID,MeasurementSetID,SPCChartControlLimitID,SubgroupID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarChartOC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WOID,CustomerOrderNo,LabelsPerInventoryPack,ItemsPerInventoryPack,ItemsPerLayer,LayersPerInventoryPack,PackingCode,LabelTemplate,LabelColour,EANCode,CusStartNum,CusEndNum,CustomerPartNo,CustomerPartDescription,LabelText1,LabelText2,LabelText3,PrinterURL,BOMVariantID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Job.JobID, Job.WOID, Job.RfJobStatusID, Job.DeadlineDT, Job.ActualStartDT, Job.ActualEndDT, Job.PlannedStartDT, Job.PlannedEndDT, Job.PlannedDuration, Job.EstimatedStartDT, Job.EstimatedEndDT, Job.EstimatedDuration, Job.ScheduledSequence, Job.LineID, Job.ProductionStartDT, Job.ProductionEndDT, Job.TheoreticalCycleTime, Job.BudgetChangeOver, Job.QuantityOrdered, Job.IsCalculated, Job.LineGroupID, Job_.JobInstructions, Job_.ReleaseDT, Job_.ReleaseLoginID, Job_.StartLoginID, Job_.EndLoginID, Job_.Comments, Job_.ModifiedDt, Job_.ModifiedLoginID, Job_.StoppedReason, Job_.SkippedReason, Job_.SkippedDT, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM Job FULL JOIN Job_ ON (Job.JobID = Job_.JobID) FULL JOIN Job_Custom ON (Job.JobID = Job_Custom.JobID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
